job.title: Embedded Engineer (Wireless/Low Power)
job.description:
Job Title: Embedded Engineer
Salary Range: $140k-$175k/yr
Location: Campbell, CA
Requirements: C/C++, Wireless (BT/WiFi/Zigbee), IoT, Low Power, Semiconductor
Based in the Bay area, we are a hot IoT startup in the semiconductor industry. Due to growth, we are actively seeking to hire an Embedded Engineer to join our team in Campbell, CA. The ideal candidate will have expertise with C/C++, Wireless Technologies, and Semiconductors. Additional experience with IoT and Low Power solutions are a plus. If this sounds like you, please apply now or send your resume to shiv.warrier@cybercoders.com!
What You Will Be Doing
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
So, if you are a Embedded Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Shiv.Warrier@CyberCoders.com
Shiv Warrier - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
